attributes.additional_details:
A betrayal of the highest order .
Whilst ordinary hard working people made sacrifices and “kept away”; did not visit loved ones; could not go to care homes, could not attend funerals and say final goodbyes, those who are entrusted to run the country and to guide us, were laughing at us
attributes.background: Get Borris Johnson to resign as prime minister

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
